sourceMeaningMnemonic: I <radical>protect</radical> my own <radical>animal</radical>s by going to <kanji>hunt</kanji> other animals... like wolves and cougars and such.
meaningInfo: My animals can't protect themselves, that's why I hunt other animals instead.
readingMnemonic: I also do all my <kanji>hunt</kanji>s using a <reading>ca</reading>r (<ja>か</ja>). I just run those animals down with my car. Kind of cheating, but vroom vroom anyways.
readingInfo: Imagine hunting down animals in a car.
